name: GMSAsteroids
description:
Note: This project is provided as a learning resource for people wanting to make games with GameMaker Studio 2.  The game itself is free, but I ask a small amount for the source code.

This is a version of the classic Asteroids that has been tweaked a little!

The core game is classic Asteroids but brings along two-player support.  A second player can jump in and join the fun at any time.  Players can also bump into each other, causing them to bounce apart - often with hilarious consequences!  Also, if a player is low on lives or dead, then the other player can donate a life if they have enough spare!  

The typical Hyperspace has gone, but in comes a little pickup inspired by the film The Last Starfighter.  Collect this and you have a single use weapon that fires lots of homing missiles off - great for when you're in a sticky situation!

The source code is fully commented and once purchased you are free to use it in your own projects.  However, you may not proceed to package any script/code from this game and sell it anywhere as a separate resource.  

Please note that I can only supply very limited support for the source code - best endeavour basis.

Further games will be provided using the same model, so follow if you'd like more GameMaker Studio 2 source code :)
